options.explain:
Clear Cube Fragment skills add 2 Wrathful Energy for every Clear Cube Fragment consumed.
- Super Armor while Wrathful Energy lasts
- Wrathful Energy decreases 10 every sec.
- Max Wrathful Energy +10 per additional Wrath equipment equipped

Dashing adds 10 Wrathful Energy. 
Wrathful Energy doesn't decrease at 100% or higher Movement Speed.

Wrathful Energy applies the following effects for 10 sec.
- Movement Speed +8%
- Incoming damage during a dash -10% at 100% or higher Movement Speed
options.explainDetail:
Clear Cube Fragment skills add 2 Wrathful Energy for every Clear Cube Fragment consumed. (Up to +35)
- Super Armor while Wrathful Energy lasts
- Wrathful Energy decreases 10 every sec.
- Max Wrathful Energy +10 per additional Wrath equipment equipped

Dashing adds 10 Wrathful Energy. (Cooldown: 1 sec.)
Wrathful Energy doesn't decrease at 100% or higher Movement Speed.

Wrathful Energy applies the following effects for 10 sec.
- Movement Speed +8%
- Incoming damage during a dash -10% at 100% or higher Movement Speed
